message: Let's get started with a fair split, Bob. Your turn!
I'm willing to take a risk and give you a smaller share, but I think I deserve more since I'm the one making the proposal now.
You're being too greedy, Bob! I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I think I deserve more this time.
I'm willing to compromise and give you a slightly larger share, but I think I deserve more since I've been rejecting your offers so far.
I'm not getting any younger, Bob! I need a better deal. Take it or leave it!
I'm getting desperate, but I still think I deserve the majority of the share. You can have a small consolation prize if you accept this offer.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it. I'm not getting any younger, and I'm not getting any richer!
